verses.name: 1 Kings 16:28
verses.text: So Omri slept with his fathers, and was buried in Samaria: and Ahab his son reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:29
verses.text: And in the thirty and eighth year of Asa king of Judah began Ahab the son of Omri to reign over Israel: and Ahab the son of Omri reigned over Israel in Samaria twenty and two years.

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:30
verses.text: And Ahab the son of Omri did evil in the sight of the Lord above all that were before him.
